data.text: @wesleysmithtv @ITVChannelTV I’ve just contracted Norovirus from my Son.  I had my 4th dose of the Covid jab last week.  Lifting restrictions really has not helped the NHS or the immune suppressed which isn’t just the elderly like the government would have us believe
@wesleysmithtv @ITVChannelTV Bet they're happy to see your cheery face Wesley!
